eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A FIRE WARNING FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Jackson, FL; AT 01:25 PM ON OCT 24, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 02:25 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: Residents in the Turtle Bend Area need to be aware of impending wild fire danger. Consider Voluntary Evacuation.  Will advise when the threat has passed.
